General.Name: Jinzai Food Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinzai Food Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, production, marketing, and sale of snack food products in China. The company offers fish, tofu, soy, and meat products under the Jinzai and Boweiyuan brand names. It also sells its products to approximately 30 countries and areas, including Europe, the United States, South Korea, Japan, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Huawen Food Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jinzai Food Group Co.,Ltd. in April 2021. Jinzai Food Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Building A, Wanda Plaza, Changsha, China, 410005
